title: Create a Contract Abstraction
description: For a large portfolio of real estate leases, a paralegal needs to create 'abstractions' or summaries of each lease, extracting key data into a spreadsheet.

tasks.description: For each lease, identify and extract key data points like Landlord, Tenant, Rent, Commencement Date, Expiration Date, and Renewal Options.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent extracts all the defined data points from the lease.

tasks.description: Populate a new row in a master spreadsheet with the extracted data for each lease.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the data to the summary spreadsheet.

tasks.description: Repeat the process for all leases in the portfolio.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete contract abstraction spreadsheet is created for the entire portfolio.
